channel.title: Setting up and using SRL tut
channel.description:
hi guys,
I thought it was about time i wrote one of these myself :) its very easy to follow and i hope you enjoy it.
LINK - http://www.scar-resources.ir8.ca/srlsetup/index.html
its dylock's page slightly modded for tutorial purposed :) enjoy...

item.title: Setting up and using SRL tut
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“B T P MAGE, post:6, topic:4928”]I followed the turtorial exactly like it says but i still cant get any script to work it always says
Include file c:\program files\scar 2.03\includes\srl/srl.scar does not exist…[/quote]

Thats because it should be: c:\program files\scar 2.03\includes\srl\srl.scar

Read full topic
